snippet: Video of Michael Davis at a memorial service, asking people to forgive the 17-year-old student who shot and killed his daughter, Claire, at Arapahoe High School in Colorado last month.
abstract: Video of Michael Davis at a memorial service, asking people to forgive the 17-year-old student who shot and killed his daughter, Claire, at Arapahoe High School in Colorado last month.

headline.main: Father Requests Forgiveness for Teenage Shooter Who Killed Daughter
